scripts.first-launch: fly apps destroy fly-tcoder-ffmpeg-worker-31657fa --yes 2>/dev/null || true && fly apps create fly-tcoder-ffmpeg-worker-31657fa && fly deploy --build-only
scripts.test:local: docker build -t fly-ffmpeg-test . && docker run --rm -e JOB_ID=test-123 -e INPUT_URL=https://example.com/input.mp4 -e OUTPUT_URL=/tmp/output.mp4 -e PRESET=default fly-ffmpeg-test
scripts.machines:start-all: fly machines list --json | jq -r '.[] | select(.state == "stopped" or .state == "suspended") | .id' | xargs -I {} fly machine start {}
scripts.machines:stop-all: fly machines list --json | jq -r '.[] | select(.state == "started") | .id' | xargs -I {} fly machine stop {}
scripts.machines:destroy-all: fly machines list --json | jq -r '.[].id' | xargs -I {} fly machine destroy {}
